snippet.title: Archetype and the Four Winds of Hell Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Master the four elements, and kill demons. In this short Metroidvania, you play as the Archetype, a legendary elemental master, on a mission to close a portal to hell and end a demon invasion. Learn new abilities, fight demons, and if you fail, be reincarnated with mastery of a different element.
Available Nov. 29, 2024.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3020370/Archetype_and_the_Four_Winds_of_Hell/
